bibl.title: The Petosiris-Necropolis of Tuna el-Gebel.

series.title: Culture and History of the Ancient Near East.

bibl.title: Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008

bibl.note: Types of tombs. - Architecture. - Types of burials. - Decoration of the tombs. - Ethnicity and social background. - Geophysical survey. - Summary.
bibl.seg: LEMBKE Katja, The Petosiris-Necropolis of Tuna el-Gebel.

Katja LEMBKE, Martina MINAS-NERPEL and Stefan PFEIFFER (Edd.), Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008 = Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 41 (Leiden, 2010) pp. 231-254, 16 figg.
